评论详情: These seemed like they would be comfortable but they squeaked no matter what floor I was walking on, as though I had just come in from the rain. Well, I imagine not on rugs. I didn't keep them on long enough to test that.

Easy to put on.  They DON'T squish my toes.  The grippy sole make them very comfortable and easy to use my foot/feet to help me give my wheelchair a little push when sitting in my wheelchair.  I recommend them.

评论概述: Had to try alot of sizes
评论详情: Could not find anything other then Wides..just wanted regular. Other wise Barefoot shoes are amazing!
They are very comfortable to wear, I find myself wearing them all the time.

I actually really liked these shoes. I have wide feet and have been wanting to get barefoot type shoes for a while but didn’t want to pay a lot. These are great quality for the price. Since the toe box is made to fit naturally I was able to “size down” to my normal size 8 instead of when I get vans and have to size up. I bought these for a trip to Costa Rica so I can hike in them but wanted shoes that were ok if they got wet. I will say you can feel rocks if you are stepping on gravel. Nothing bad but more of that barefoot type feeling but they feel great. There is a little cushion on the back part of the shoe which make them so comfortable and you don’t need to break them in. I got the black with the white trim and they were cute. I’m sure more expensive barefoot shoes are nicer but for someone needing them quickly and wouldn’t be bummed if something would happen to them these are the shoes.
super comfortable and great for morning walk

These are surprisingly comfortable, even on first wear. I have a bunionette (pinky toe) and my shoes have been killing me. These have a very wide toe and are flexible. They're kinda it pull on and the laces are more for security. I usually do not have luck with pull on style shoes due to having wide feet, but these fit perfect. True to size 11w for me. Great value for price. They're also very neutral in style, so you can wear them with a lot of different outfits.
I love these shoes. Very lightweight, comfortable and easy to put on. Lots of toe room. Well worth the money and would buy again.
FIT WELL, COMFORTABLE AND STURDY MATERIAL. GREAT FOR ADEMA IN THE ANKLES, ONLY SHOES THAT FIT ME NOW.
I love this slip-on shoe!  It is so comfortable.  Love the ample sized toe box.  Perfect for casual wear.  Great flat casual!

I opened these Christmas,  couldn't wait to put them on and this is how they were packaged.  My son got me these, I couldn't be more disappointed.  They came from China and I have no clue what they were stepped in.0

The problem with this pair of shoes is that the tongue is attached to the sides of the shoes, making it so that you're having to force your foot into a narrower area. While ppl with slimmer feet wouldn't have an issue, the people who would normally get these shoes, heavier people, are stuck with a piece of crap pair of shoes that won't fit right and god help you if you put on socks! I can't stand socks being tight against my toes because that junk hurts! They're still good-looking but the material is breathable, isn't solid, which makes life difficult when you're trying to walk across slippery areas. I have bad knees and I don't need this crud! Very dissatisfied. The only reason I'd gotten these is because the pair I wanted was out and unknown when it would be back in supply.

The shoes are very comfortable. I love the toe room and the overall wearability of them. Although I have a high arch, I haven't had a problem with no arch support yet. It probably depends on how long you wea them.
I got these for wearing inside and absolutely love them! The toe box is nice and wide.

These are soft and flexible. They are comfortable to walk in. I ordered a size 11 and they fit me well. I like the little/tiny bit of extra space they have in the toe box. The issue I have is that they're just a tiny bit shorter than my regular size 11 shoes I purchase. So although they fit, they fit my feet when I'm wearing nylons or no socks. If I wear my cute athletic socks, they are tight on me and not as comfortable. So take that into account when you're ordering...if you're close to the heel to toe measurement, order a size up.
Soft shoes with stable and comfortable fit.

评论概述: They really feel like you have no shoes on.
评论详情: I love everything about them
Great fit so comfortable and easy to slide on.

I bought these shoes in a size 8. They were a bit snug but not too bad. But besides the nice wide toe box, it should also give more room in height for your toes. So I bought another pair in a size 9 (half sizes not available). There’s a bit more room in the length, but the toe box still needs more height so your toes aren’t squished on top. Other than that, the shoes are lightweight, breathable and fairly comfortable. Great for the price.
These fit nice and wide for feet that may swell.  Very comfortable to walk in and lace up easily as well. They have good stretch to them as well. Love these.

The minute I slipped these I could not believe they could be so comfortable!  Everything you want in an everyday walking shoe.  True to size, look great and feel even better.  Highly recommend.  If I could justify buying another pair right now I would.  Eventually I am sure to have several more pair.  Happy with my choice of gray w/ black sole.
Looking for comfort.  Definite looking at me a cheap shoe.

Very comfortable 7 was a perfect fit I usually buy 6.5/7 depending on style of shoe. I love the room for the toes. More shoes should be made like this you don’t feel like your toes are constantly being squished. I’m definitely gonna be purchasing more and other colors.
I love the box toe of the shoes. Keeps my feet comfortable.
Bought these shoes for trip to Tokyo, aka "the walking city". These shoes did not disappoint!
They are nice and wide, comfortable for wearing short periods of time but they provide no arch support. They do run a bit large.
These are comfortable and easy to wear. Very light weight. There isn't much padding/support with the insert but I love how my feet fit into these shoes! Decent quality.

I wear a 7.5 and bought an 8 in black with white bottom. They are wide in the toe box like I need. The sole is more cushion than other barefoot shoes which is great for more walking. Doesn’t feel like cardboard or straight concrete. I am going to try size 7 all white.

评论概述: They give your feet room to spread out.
评论详情: These shoes are comfortable. The toe box is wider than regular shoes. The sole is fairly flat. I did not like that I had trouble slipping them on over socks. I just wear them without. The knit band makes slipping them on and off easy.

I'm sick to death of "barefoot" shoe companies advertising that they're perfect for diabetics, people with swollen feet, lymphedema, etc. and then selling shoes which do not stretch over the tops of the feet. I thought these would be cute, basic little sneakers to wear for fashion more than function.  I imagine if you truly have wide feet or bunions with no other swelling, these would be fine, as long as you aren't expecting arch support.  However, the tongue is sewn to the top in both shoes, despite having full laces, and the top portion of the shoe does not have the vertical stretch I needed it to. I do not have wide feet--I buy wide shoes due to swelling, and I would not be able to put these sneakers on over a pair of socks.
I really love them!! So very comfortable, I am so surprised!!
Great fit! Exceeded my expectations in comfort and quality bought another pair.

I bought these because I thought they might be a good shoe to walk in. The soles are flat, zero support. The rubber on the bottom is rather thin, in my opinion. I have found my feet ache after walking for a bit. I do like the fabric they are made out of, very breathable and flexible. Very nice for wide feet. Might be ok house shoes.

评论概述: Very nice shoe, but not for me
评论详情: I have to say these shoes are incredibly comfortable and exactly what I expected from the listing. The soles are nice and the material is so comfy it feels like a thick sock. However, it does not work for my foot condition. I have hammer toe, bunion, and arch issues (flat and high depending). With worst pain in the ball of my feet. I saw people suggest this type of shoe for my condition, but these were worse than walking on the bare ground and made my calves cramp. I guess I just need solid support shoes.  If you like walking on the floor or if you want a solid house slipper you should buy these!! Awesome shoes just doesn't work for me. I love the look and feel, I just know I will never wear them.  BTW I'm size 8.5-9 women's. Ordered a 9 wide, no problems with length at all.

The shoe is very comfortable. I especially like the elastic around the heel, it keeps the shoe in position as I walk.  I have a whole closet full of shoes that I cannot wear because my toes are red, sore, and swollen.  These comfortable shoes will give my toes a chance to heal.  I am very happy with my new comfortable shoes.

评论概述: Watch the size, but these are super comfortable.
评论详情: This is my first pair of barefoot shoes.  They have knit tops and rubber soles.  I measured my foot at 9 1/2 inches long.  I normally wear a 8W shoe. I thought a 9 W should fit. I was wrong. My toes went to the very tip.  My mother always said you should have a thumbs width from your big toe to the shoe tip. I had no trouble returning the shoes and ordered a size up. They fit like a glove.  They fit as good as my leather moccasins. The wide box lets your toes spread out. I  have not had these long enough to know durability or how long they will last, but for now I am very happy with my purchase.
These run really large
Nice shoes but just didn't fit comfortable.
I would give a five but I had to buy another cushion pad the one in the shoe is really thin otherwise they are comfortable

I got these for work. I like the zero drop but they could use a bit more cush to wear on concrete all day. The only thing I dont like is that the tongue is sown to the inside of the shoe. They need to be tied perfectly or there is a fold that irritates the top of my foot.
I liked fhe stretch in theopening, no pressure on ankle tendons.  I could not tighten enough to stay on my foot without tongue and toe bed wrinkling.  They felt and looked like clown shoes.

These shoes are fairly comfortable but I miss the cushioning my other walking shoes provide.  They are simple, washable, lots of toe room which is what I need.  I will add some orthotic inserts which I think will make them better for walking.

评论概述: Perfect if you would rather be barefoot!
评论详情: I absolutely hate wearing tennis shoes but have to wear closed toe shoes in my line of work. They squeeze my toes together and cause my nails to hurt. Wearing these shoes are a perfect alternative. My toes can spread out and there was still enough room in the shoe to put my insole inserts in. The shoe is cute, even if the toe box is a little orthopedic looking.

There shoes run big. I know they are supposed to be oversized in the toe box, but when I wear them they feel like I'm wearing sloppy baby shoes. The toe box is absurdly large. They might feel better had I ordered a smaller size, but I ordered the size I usually wear. They color is a pretty baby blue and they are lightweight shoes.  Unfortunately, they are not anything I would wear out in public. If you have sensitive feet and want to feel like you're wearing knitted socks instead of shoes, there are for you.
Casual wear, fashionable, very light weight shoes, look great, good price.

These are very comfortable to wear, very lite on my feet, truly love wearing these ladies shoes. If anyone is looking for a comfortable ladies shoe to wear consider trying these from this company, very happy!
These shoes are great for wide feet. They have stretch to them and you can easily put them on. I can walk for hours in them and they dry fast if you get them wet.
I LOVE THESE THEY ARE COMFORTABLE AND DO NOT HURT MY FEET, I CAN WEAR THEM ALL DAY AND THEY DO NOT BOTHER ME AND MY FEET DO NOT HURT.

I feel as though these 'minimalist walking shoes' are worse than flip flops. They are mesh, so breathable in the summer---Good.  Otherwise, there is absolutely no arch at all, the base of the shoe is flimsy like a flip flop, I see no positives with these 'shoes'  If you care to barefoot walk, then barefoot walk without these.

评论概述: Spacious, lightweight. Don't need to size up.
评论详情: I'm usually a 9 or 9 1/2. I ordered 9 1/2 but definitely could have done a 9.  I'm a 28 year old mom of two and I'm not sure if it was the pregnancies that spaced out my toes or what but I've started to despise the narrow shoes I used to wear like converse. I found myself only wearing crocs and birks because of the nice width. So I decided to try some wide, barefoot type shoes for the first time. I have nothing similar to compare these to but I can say that I like them. Definitely roomy and light. They have cushion behind the heel which I didn't expect. Hard to tell if I truley like the cushioning because these are atleast half a size big on me.  All in all, these are worth a shot if you've never tried shoes like this before and don't want to spend a ton of money on some big brand. I'm definitely going to keep wearing these, these are my new staple walking shoes.

My dayjob has me walking all over the place so I saw this and thought "walking shoes! just what I need!" and here's my takeaway so far!  Materials? Construction? The whole thing feels cheap; its materials are thin (which made it easy to ship at least? makes it affordable) and at first the shoe felt like its 'parts' were shifting beneath my feet as I walked. They remind me of moccasins? but not with the durability of leather. These also barely even have a tongue - even the laces feel cheap. And support? what support? I thought these were for walking, but I felt the sudden difference in these compared with any shoes that have good insoles. Definitely not meant for long days on your feet! is this how walking shoes normally are? at least they are very lightweight.  Okay, what about style?! They're not particularly stylish or good looking but not hideous. I feel on closer inspection, they definitely show their price if you know what I mean? but no parts are fraying or poorly seamed so that's good. I got mine in black and it works okay. They pair well with ankle socks.  Are they at least wearable? Sure! they fit just right, and the flexible siding really helps with that. That is very nice for me, sometimes I feel my feet are so difficult to size, but these worked with them just right. The flexible mouth means, I can't just slip them on hands-free and I don't like that. But on the bright side it means, less bugs at my ankles and stones in my shoes, because the shoe's mouth wraps around my ankle very nicely. Like many cloth shoes its very breathable (have some sense, don't wear it in the rain). I suspect they would wash & dry easily too but haven't done that yet, it can shorten a shoe's lifespan if you do it too much too rough.  Overall, I'm 'okay' with them - really the fact that they fit me just right is such a nice thing for me, but if this isn't usually a problem for you they wouldn't be my first choice.

I must admit that I wasn't really sure about these when I put them on, but I really do like them. They are almost like going barefoot, which is good and bad. I do wish they had just a tiny bit of arch support, so I added a simple insole. The wide toe-bed is awesome!!! So much room for my toes and you can flex them easily. Really like wearing them, even though they look a bit funny on your feet.
comfy and lightweight

As I've gotten older, my feet have become more & more finicky over what shoes they'll accept & still allow me to get around.  I wear Rockport sandals for 75% of the year--until it gets below about 35 degrees  F--and my toes feel like they're going to fall off.  I'd wear them 100% of the year if I could.  Since  it will eventually get too chilly for that in the lower MidWest, I need to have other shoes that can keep me moving.  I've tried all the major brands & have spent unGodly sums on shoes that make my entire foot go numb.  (I have an uncommon type of neuropathy in both hands & both feet, and most lace-up shoes press in  just the right spot to make the top of my feet go numb--the bottoms are partially numb all the time, and certain shoes can make them completely numb & have that awful burning, pins & needles sensation.)  I also have Plantar Fasciitis, so that adds another level of complication when looking for shoes.  Back to these shoes--they didn't make the tops of my feet go numb--and they might be the only lace-up shoes I've been able to wear in the last 6 years that didn't do that.  The bottoms of my feet stayed numb in their normal places, but it didn't make the bottoms burn or prickle.  I really liked the wide toe box & felt like my feet weren't cramped in any way.  To me, looking down at them on my feet, I felt like my feet looked wider in them, but my daughter didn't think they look that way at all.  Also, because these are barefoot/zero drop shoes, there is virtually no padding in the bottom.  So, I was able to wear them for a bit around the house, but I'm probably going to have to add some sort of padding in there in order to be able to keep them on for longer without hobbling.  I like these better than the other barefoot/zero drop shoes I have because of the roominess & lack of extra loss of sensation in my feet.  If they had more padding & a little arch support in the footbed, while still keeping the roominess of the toe box, they'd be nearly perfect for me.  As a side note, if you're looking for shoes with arch support, these are NOT the ones you want unless you'd be okay with adding an insert that has arch support built into it.  I'm pleased so far & will continue to wear them & tweak them a little.  If my opinion changes over time, I'll come back & update this review.
Super comfortable.  Walked 2 miles on treadmill day I  received with no discomfort. Will be buying more colors.

These shoes look cute just like the product photo. I got the purple color and it is a light pinkish purple. The white laces contrast the purple color and look good. These are minimalist shoes so they are slim and not chunky. They have a wide rounded toe box. They are comfortable for my bunion. They come with an insole that provides a little bit of cushion especially in the heal. Like most zero drop shoes they take some adjustment to walk in. The first time you wear them you may feel some strain in your feet and calves. They came slightly wrinkled in the front. Good summer shoe.

Shoes are roomy without being loose.  Typically wearing a 7.5, the 7's fit fine.  After wearing these all day, there were no rubs and my feet were comfortable.  I really like these shoes... lightweight, pretty, comfortable...
These shoes are very lightweight. The material is sturdy and the color is exactly as described. They fit true to size and are truly wide in the front. Comfortable and cute.

评论概述: Excellent for wide feet and bunions
评论详情: My feet have won the lottery when it comes to being jacked.  Ladies, take care of your feet while you're young, I wish I had done a better job.Today, as a 50yo woman, I have wide flat feed, bunions, hammer toes, and recently found out I also have OA and it doesn't help that I'm a heavy person.  Due to the issues I have on my feet, my choice in shoes are very limited.  I can't wear anything that puts pressure on the sides of my feet, the slightest pressure hurts.These shoes are soft and super wide at the front and are made of a stretchy material.  If I raise my toe, you can see the impression through the material.  The inside is somewhat soft, not the softest but they're not uncomfortable either.  The back of the ankle area has soft padding and they go on really easy.  Soles are flat and not very thick so it really does feel like you're walking barefoot.  Personally, I can't walk barefoot but I'm able to do so wearing these shoes.  They don't provide much support either, considering they don't have support and the sole isn't very thick, I'm able to walk with these comfortably.  As far as looks, I don't think they would win any beauty contest but if you're looking for comfort over looks, these should do a decent job.As far as the size, I say they are true to size.  I put my foot on a measuring tape and the tip of my foot was right at 9.5, that's what I ordered and they are perfect.

OK so first thing is, these shoes are super cute looking and goes with any type of ensemble you'll be wearing. Now the good part, wearing these has helped me so very much. I have a neurological disease that messes with my gait and walking. I had no issues with these. They fit very well and the wider area in the toes helps with my toe pain. The mesh material isn't itchy either. I've worn these for a few days and no issues.

I really do love the look of these shoes. The color is very nice and they look great. Like the extra to room. The shoes are very easy to put on and take off. They also are lightweights. The only thing that I don’t really like is that I feel a bit of pressure on the top of my big toes. It’s slightly uncomfortable. It would be great if that part was made with a little bit more room so that will eliminate that pressure. Other than that, I think these shoes are pretty great.
I really like these slip on shoes, I can just slip my feet in without even having to sit down. They fit perfect and are very comfortable. Well made !

These shoes are exactly as described...lightweight, comfortable, wide toe area.  However...there's an abundance of fabric that bunches up when I tie the shoes.  It looks awkward and the bunched up fabric hurts the top of my feet when I'm walking.  The shoes have excellent heel support and padding, it's just that bunched up fabric that's the problem.  Finding a pair of solid white shoes these days is like looking for a needle in a haystack, so I was so excited to find these...unfortunately, they won't work for me.  :(

These are called minimalist walking shoes, and they are very light weight. They slip on easily and feel more like pool shoes than sneakers. I'm actually a little disappointed that I didn't get these earlier in the season, as I think I might have liked them for the pool. But they are well ventilated and bendable, and not unattractive -- I got black, which works with everything, and they feel good on my feet. So many sneakers these days are huge and clunky, and I don't love that heavy feel or that aesthetic. These are almost like slippers. That said, I'm not sure if there's enough support for regular walking outside of the house. They also run a little big, so you may want to size down.
